item.title: Joomla 5.2.0 and 4.4.9 Released: Discover important improvements in your User Experience!

  • Customizable Email Templates: Create HTML email templates directly from the Joomla admin panel to keep communications consistent with your brand.
  • Create Categories Directly in Menus: Speed up your workflow by saving categories directly within menus, showcasing Joomla's user-interface and workflow efficiency.

  • Optimized Image Thumbnails: Better thumbnail compression for faster page loading and efficient storage management.

  • CSS Class Selector in TinyMCE: Style links easily with the new CSS class selector in the TinyMCE editor, accelerating content creation.

  • PHP 8.4 Support: Enjoy full support for PHP 8.4, delivering top performance and security updates.
  • Improved Password Security: Enhance security with improved password options that support more special characters.
  • Better Task Management: Administrators receive alerts if scheduled tasks fail, helping them manage the site more proactively.

  • Fixed language switching problem caused during language loading (#9473).
  • Enhanced canvas header to work smoothly with Bootstrap 5 (#9481).
  • Resolved CSS conflicts in tab navigation (#9480).
  • Improved responsive design on the Canvas Home navigation (#9477).
  • Corrected null field outputs in htmlspecialcharacters (#9467).
